alert.note: Alert for Bolivar; Issaquena; Sharkey; Sunflower; Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 03 at 1:18AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Arkansas, northeast Louisiana and Mississippi, including the following counties and parishes, in southeast Arkansas, Ashley and Chicot. In northeast Louisiana, East Carroll, Morehouse, Richland and West Carroll. In Mississippi, Bolivar, Issaquena, Sharkey, Sunflower and Washington. * WHEN...Until Noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Several rounds of heavy rain have fallen in the area since last night, and additional heavy rain through this morning could cause flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
